.load core/testdata/family_rules.dl
----
application/datalog

mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}.
----
incremental-datalog/trace
mother: [mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}+1]
17: [{C: "Pete", M: "Mary"}+1]
21: [{C: "Pete", P: "Mary"}+1]
29: [{B: "Pete", C: "Mary"}+1]
19: []

30: []

23: [{L: "Pete", P1: "Mary"}+1]
26: [{P2: "Mary", R: "Pete"}+1]
28: [{A: "Pete", B: "Mary"}+1]
32: [{X: "Pete", Z: "Mary"}+1]
33: [{X: "Pete", Y: "Mary"}+1]

35: []

application/datalog
ancestor{an: "Mary", desc: "Pete"}.

-mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}.
